greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of squared radius of inscribed circles of triangles with integer sides i <= j <= k, such that the number of triangles with this radius sets a new record. Numerators are A331040.
comment: See A331040. Conjecturally, all terms a(n) are either 1 or 4 for n >= 3.
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Jan 11 2020
